summary.span: 命名空間可讓應用程式開發人員使用單一 API 輕鬆存取電腦位置。

span.span: The namespace allows application developers to easily access the computer's location by using a single API.

summary.span: 位置資訊可能來自於多個提供者，例如 GPS、Wi-Fi 三角定位以及手機基地台三角定位。

span.span: Location information may come from multiple providers, such as GPS, Wi-Fi triangulation, and cell phone tower triangulation.

summary.span: 類別可提供單一 API，這個 API 會封裝電腦上的多個位置提供者，並在其間支援平順的設定優先權和轉換作業。

span.span: The classes provide a single API to encapsulate the multiple location providers on a computer and support seamless prioritization and transitioning between them.

summary.span: 因此，使用這個 API 的應用程式開發人員不需要修改應用程式以適應特定的硬體組態。

span.span: As a result, application developers who use this API do not need to tailor applications to specific hardware configurations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供位置資料，取決於緯度和經度座標。The class supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates. 和類型提供了可民事位址解析座標位置。The and types provide the ability to resolve from a coordinate location to a civic address. 此外，介面可以實作以擴充所提供的位置資料類型。Additionally, the interface can be implemented to extend the types of location data that are supplied. 在 Windows 7 中，所有類別包含完整的功能，如果已安裝的位置提供者，且可以判斷電腦的位置。In Windows 7, all the classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and can determine the computer's location. 在 Windows 7 入門版本中，可以在控制台中設定的預設位置提供者是支援的唯一位置提供者。On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the Default Location Provider that can be set in Control Panel is the only location provider that is supported. **請注意**在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，套用下列條件：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 所有可以建立具有建構函式的物件，但屬性一律會有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 所表示之位置屬性一定會。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 沒有位置將會引發事件。No location events will be raised.
